lead_paragraph: Attorney General Kamala Harris on Tuesday asked a judge to toss out a proposed ballot initiative that advocates killing anyone who engages in gay sex.

headline.main: California: Dismissal Sought for Initiative to Kill Gays
headline.print_headline: California: Dismissal Sought For Initiative To Kill Gays

snippet: Attorney General Kamala Harris on Tuesday asked a judge to toss out a proposed ballot initiative that advocates killing anyone who engages in gay sex.
